Subbed Projects.Show Name: ef: A Tale of Melodies. - Prologue

Good Comments: i had play back issues with their subs
Bad Comments: I had problems with the soft subs of an other group so I decided to try this group since they used hard subs

Good Comments: Way too small subs, way too low on the screen, ridiculous colors, TL/editing compares unfavorably to SS-Eclipse, a.f.k., and the ADV/Funimation DVD subs.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Kimi ga Aruji de Shitsuji ga Ore de
Mahou Sensei Negima! Mou Hitotsu no Sekai

Good Comments: The best. Awesome fonts, also translated the latin like they did in the manga which is nice. Apparently also fixed the playback issue some had, check their site.
it in my opinion was better then the sfw copy of the show. i saw both copies of the first episode and the aqs version was much better
Well they did a job.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Mahou Sensei Negima! Shiroki Tsubasa Ala Alba

Good Comments: FUCK YES VIDEO QUALITY.
AVI Renders funky, but it was well explained by the group
Awesomesauce.
Subs not distracting, really good translations
Bad Comments: No one else seems to be doing it
aqs did it right they are one of my favorite in the mahou sensei negima world of fan subbing hope they keep it up :)

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Memories Off #5 Togireta Film The Animation

Good Comments: Translations okay, but sub styling hard to read (subs should be practical, not "cute"), and very awkward/unnatural editing. You know, scratch that, I'm just going to call it "bad writing."
Their editors needs to brush up on his/her English skills.
Some lines weren't translated...
新月 is a new moon, not the first of the month. They had it right the first time.Episode 12: ”おれ、なんかすごく大事なことを忘れてるのような気がするんだ。” Completely omitted this line.
Bad Comments: Very cute fonts, h264, and really nice translation - what could be better? :)
Often missed entire lines of dialog. Overall questionable translation in many parts where words and even entire lines were mistranslated (especially in the last couple of episodes).
some words are wrong or sounds not so good like from Kedex ^^

Good Comments: Maybe so, but they take their time becaue they want it to look good.
They are slow but subbing and video quality were great :)
Nice, crisp words, easy to read.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru Special

Good Comments: good order, timing
picture quality
Read well and there were several T/L notes to help a non-Japanese person like myself enjoy the story more
Great traanslation. I really miss something like this nowadays [2016]
Bad Comments: Watched [Avalon/AQS] and their relases and subs are pretty good. A couple places with weird grammar, but the subs overall were very good with good font style and size.
Easy to read due to good colours. Letters aren't too large.

Good Comments: Quality work as always
Bad Comments: I really miss subs like this one (2018)

Good Comments: Is this group incapable of writing English subs that actually sound like English?
Great traanslation. I really miss something like this nowadays [2016]
Bad Comments: Some very necessary and some unnecessary notes. Phrasing could be better.
